msItem.title: The Khamsah, or five poems, of Niẓāmī
خمسۀ نظامى

msItem.title: Three episodes from the Shāhnāmah of Firdawsī

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 868.

msItem.title: Qasīdahs in praise of Muḥammad and the Imāms

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, pages 868-9.

msItem.title: Mifātīḥ al-kalām fī midāīḥ al-karām
مفاتیح الکلام فی مدایح الکرام
msItem.note: A qasīdah ingeniously contrived so as to offer examples of all the Persian metres

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 869.
For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 869.

author.persName: Kāshī, Jamshīd ibn Masʻūd, d. ca. 1436
Jamshīd b. Masʻūd b. Maḥmūd Ghiyās̲
جمشید بن مسعود بن محمود غیاث

author.persName: Kāshī, Jamshīd ibn Masʻūd, d. ca. 1436
Jamshīd b. Masʻūd b. Maḥmūd Ghiyās̲
جمشید بن مسعود بن محمود غیاث

msItem.title: Mukhtaṣir dar ʻilm-i Iqlīdis
مختصر در علم اقلیدس
msItem.note: Elements of geometry, consisting of a few theorems from the first book ofEuclid, with diagrams

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 869.

msItem.title: Risālah kibrīt aḥmar
رساله کبریت احمر
msItem.note: An alchemical treatise, written forSulṭan Jalāl al-Dīn Iskandar

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.

msItem.title: Fiqh dar maz̲hab shīʻah
فقه در مذهب شیعه
msItem.note: A manual of Shīʻah law, according toImām ʻAlī b. Mūsā al-Riz̤ā

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.

msItem.title: Fiqh Abū Ḥanīfah
فقه ابو حنیفه
msItem.note: A treatise on the law of religious observances

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.

msItem.title: Maʻrifat taqvīm va asṭarlāb
معرفت تقویم و اسطرلاب
msItem.note: A treatise on the computation of the calendar and the use of the astrolabe, with tables of the conjunctions of the planets

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.

msItem.title: Rawz̤at al-munajjimīn
روضة المنجمين
msItem.note: An extensive treatise on astrology, in fifteen Maqālahs

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.
For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.
For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 870.

msItem.title: An anthology
msItem.note: containing select pieces of upwards of three hundred poets, from thefifth to the ninth century, classed according to their subjects or metrical forms

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, pages 870-1.

msItem.title: An abridgment of the Niẓām al-tavārīkh
msItem.note: The original work was brought down to the reign ofAbū Saʻīd, Ilkhān of the Mongols, fl. 1316-1335, son ofUljāytū Khudābandah, Ilkhan of Iran, ca. 1280-1316and written byBayḍāwī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, d. 1286?

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

msItem.title: Tuḥfat al-gharāʼib
تحفة الغرائب
msItem.note: An anonymous compilation, in twenty-eight Bābs, treating of the properties and hidden virtues of natural substances, of various magical and cabalistic operations, and of ingenious devices and recipes for purposes of utility or amusement

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

msItem.title: Madkhal manẓūm
مدخل منظوم
msItem.note: A manual of astrology in mas̲navī rhyme

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

author.persName: Jurjānī, Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥasan, 1042 or 3-1136 or 7

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

msItem.title: A treatise on the diseases of the horse

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

msItem.title: A treatise on alchemy
msItem.note: Compiled by order ofSulṭan Jalāl al-Dīn Iskandar

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.
For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

author.persName: Shabistarī, Maḥmūd ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm, d. ca. 1320

msItem.title: Saʻādatnāmah
سعادت نامه
msItem.note: A theological treatise in Mas̲navī rhyme, containing an exposition of the Sunni creed, with Sufi comments and a refutation of heretical doctrines

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Rieu 1876-83, page 871.

handDesc.handNote:
Minute naskh
Muḥammad al-Ḥalvāʼī al-Jalālī al-Iskandarī ,محمد هلوائی ال جلالی الاسکندری

origin.date: From Jumāda I., 813 to Jumāda II., 814

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Ch. Rieu: Catalogue of Persian Manuscripts in the British Museum. 3 vols, London, 1879-83

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contactBritish Library, Registering for a Reader Pass). Contactapac-enquiries@bl.ukfor further information on the availability of this manuscript
